titleStmt.title: Something written concerning the worlds creed, or, What they teach their children to believe for a belief of words cannot save the soul, but a belief in the light, Christ Jesus, the word of God ...
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to William Smith. cf. NUC pre-56, p. 306.
